item.title: Approving Pages in OU Campus
item.description: Getting started When you first open up a submitted web page, you may be wondering what is different between the submission and the live versions. During user training, encourage your content managers to write descriptions that outline what they’ve changed. Encourage content managers to write a clear subject and message detailing what content has changed. Before you begin reviewing, save a new version of the staged page with a description “As submitted by user,"–this way, you can revert or compare your changes to the original submission.
